properties.description: East Riding libraries offer warm welcoming places, with comfy seating, books, games and jigsaws. Please check our website for service updates and any changes to our usual opening hours.

properties.address: Gilberdyke War Memorial Hall, Brough, North Humberside HU15 2UG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 28th January 2026** On the last Wednesday of each month, the East Riding Food Poverty Alliance will be hosting the Together Hub, a pop up community pantry and social space for people to access affordable food, a hot drink and make new friends. The Together Hub is open to residents in Gilberdyke and surrounding villages.
properties.title: War Memorial Hall Gilberdyke
